jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.description: Develop user-friendly web applications using React and JavaScript.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.description: Build and maintain server-side applications using Node.js and Express.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description: Work on both front-end and back-end development, collaborating with designers and product managers.

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Create intuitive and engaging user experiences for web and mobile applications.

jobs.title: Software Engineer Intern
jobs.description: Assist in the development of software solutions while learning from experienced engineers.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.description: Manage and optimize cloud infrastructure and CI/CD pipelines.

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.description: Lead product development from concept to launch, ensuring alignment with business goals.
